name: @sohantalukder/react-native-boilerplate
description: A comprehensive React Native template with modern tools and best practices including TypeScript, Navigation, State Management, and UI components
author: Sohan Talukder

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:changelog
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:changelog
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run release:changelog
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run release:create
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run release:create
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run release:create
